thread.title: Wauconda High School Evacuated Over Bomb Threat
thread.title_full: Wauconda High School Evacuated Over Bomb Threat

title: Wauconda High School Evacuated Over Bomb Threat

organizations.name: wauconda high school evacuated over bomb threat wauconda high school

text:
Wauconda High School Evacuated Over Bomb Threat February 2, 2017 2:12 PM Filed Under: Bomb threat , Crime , Evacuated , Wauconda High School 
CHICAGO (CBS) — Wauconda High School was evacuated Thursday afternoon while police investigated a bomb threat. 
Wauconda School District 118 said the school was placed on hard lockdown shortly before 1 p.m., while police evaluated the threat. 
As a precaution, the school later was evacuated using district school buses, according to police and school district officials. WHS staff/students safely evacuated from WHS via D118 buses. Evacuation was a precautionary measure due to a possible bomb threat. #d118life 
— Wauconda CUSD 118 (@WaucondaCUSD118) February 2, 2017 
Police said everyone was safe, and the threat remained under investigation. 
Further information was not immediately available.
